channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Dave Matthews Band 2025 Summer Tour: How to Get Last-Minute Tickets
item.description: 🎶 Score those sweet last-minute tix for the ultimate summer vibe with Dave Matthews Band! 🌞🎸 #SummerTourFun #LiveMusicExcitement

item.title: Britney Spears Admits to Lighting a Cigarette on a Flight, Apologizes
item.description: Oops, she did it again! 🛫🚬 Sending love to Britney for keeping it real! 💖 #BritneySpears #CelebNews

item.title: Sophie Turner Shows Support for Ex-Husband Joe Jonas’ New Album
item.description: Former flames, forever supportive! 🔥🎶 Sophie Turner cheers on Joe Jonas' latest musical masterpiece. #FriendshipGoals #MusicNews

item.title: Michael Jackson biopic delayed until 2027 and may be released in two parts
item.description: 🚀 Get ready to moonwalk down memory lane! The Michael Jackson biopic is now a double feature coming in 2027! 🌟🎥 #KingOfPop #BiopicDelay

item.title: See Justin Bieber Join SZA for Surprise ‘Snooze’ Performance in Los Angeles
item.description: 🎶 Spontaneous magic alert! 🌟 Justin Bieber + SZA = Unexpected awesomeness in LA! 🎤 Let the good vibes roll! 🙌 #MusicMoment

item.title: Torche Announce Reunion Show Three Years After Breakup
item.description: Guess who's back! Torche is reuniting for one epic show 🤘 Let's rock out together! #TorcheReunion 🎸✨

item.title: Neil Young Plays His “Favorite” Deep Cut For The First Time In 42 Years At Ontario School Benefit
item.description: 🎸 Neil Young rocks the stage with a 42-year throwback jam at an Ontario school benefit! 🎶 #LegendaryComeback #MusicMagic

item.title: Justin Bieber Makes Onstage Return With SZA In Los Angeles
item.description: 🎤 Justin Bieber and SZA bring the heat in LA! 🔥 Who's ready for this epic collab? #BieberXSZA #MusicNews

item.title: D’Angelo Cancels Roots Picnic Performance Over Medical Issue
item.description: Sending healing vibes to D'Angelo 🌟 Wishing him a speedy recovery! 🎶 #GetWellSoonDangelo #MusicNews

item.title: Roger Nichols, Grammy-Nominated Co-Writer of ‘We’ve Only Just Begun,’ Dies at 84
item.description: 🎶 Remembering a legend 🌟 Roger Nichols, co-writer of 'We've Only Just Begun,' will forever live on through his music. 💫 #RIPRogerNichols

item.description: 🎶 Dive into the magic of music creation with @AlejandroSanz and @Shakira as they spill the beans on 'Bésame'! ✨ #MusicMagic #BehindTheScenes

item.description: 🎶 Questlove's reaction to Kendrick Lamar's homage in 'Squabble Up' is everything! Legends recognizing legends. 🙌 #musicnews #hiphopgems

item.description: Blackpink's summer stadium tour just got even hotter with the announcement of its epic name 🔥 Let the countdown to 'Deadline' begin! 🎶 #Blackpink #DeadlineTour
